h1: Best image resizer tool for pinterest available online for free
h2: Upload and resize your image for pinterest in one click
TITLE: Resize image for pinterest | Online Image resizer tool
META: Looking for a free and online image resizer for  pinterest? Visit our website and resize image for pinterest in few seconds.

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our free Pinterest Image Resizer tool is very simple to use. You don't need any prior knowledge. You don't even need to sign up. Just upload the image, choose from the 6 Pinterest image sizes as required and voila! You'll be done.
The Pinterest Image Resizer feature is free to use for anybody and everybody. You don't need to pay us to use it. You can use it to resize your Pinterest images as per your requirements.
Our Image Resizer feature is completely web-based. That is why, it provides our users cross-platform support. So it can be used across all types of devices and all Operating systems.
All of your data and files are deleted right away after you are done. Our online free tool doesn't save any of the user data. So it is completely trustworthy and safe.

Ours is the most comprehensive tool for resizing Pinterest photos according to your requirements. Whether you want you photo to be as per the size of Pinterest profile picture, or board display, we have it all. And our tool will work in a very fast and efficient manner.

Our Pinterest Image Resizer tool has multiple resizing options available. Based on how you want your picture to be resized, there are 6 generic options that we provide according to the different picture types possible in Pinterest. You can choose one or multiple options.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to resize your images
steps: Upload the image that you want to resize to our Pinterest Image Resizer.
Select the appropriate size or multiple sizes, whichever you need.
Hit the download all to download all available sizes.
Hit the download selected button to download selected image sizes. That's it, it's that simple.

FAQ.question: How to resize images for pinterest?
FAQ.answer: Go to our website, Pinterest Image Resizer, to resize your Pinterest image. Upload your picture and you can see how exactly your picture will look as  Picture. If you still need to made adjustments, click on edit and make the required adjustments. Download the picture once you are happy with the image. Once you upload the picture on Pinterest Image Resizer from safeimagekit.com you can zoom in / zoom out using two finger scroll to cale to fit your Pinterest profile picture. Once you are satisfied with the fit, click on download to download your picture.

FAQ.question: How can I adjust the height of the image using the Pinterest image resizer feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The first step of all, upload the image which requires an edit. The next step includes adjusting the important parameters of the image, this includes adjusting the height. Now, to access this option you need to select a category from all the versions and hit the edit option to begin the editing then, there will be a pop-up wherein you can drag in and adjust the height of the image. The bonus option is that we can zoom in and out, to control the required content of the image just by scrolling in and out.

FAQ.question: How can I resize an image using the Pinterest image resizer feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer:
There are 6 steps that the user can refer to while resizing an image file,
These include-
-	Upload the image file which requires a change.
-	Select the required category of the image from the options provided.
-	Hit edit, to start adjusting the image by its height and width.
-	If you like multiple image categories, just select them by clicking a box on the top right corner of each image version.
-	Hit the “download selected” to download a particular/multiple versions.
-	Hit the “download all” to download all the image versions out there.

FAQ.question: Can we resize the image files which are locked, using the Pinterest image resizer feature from safeimagekit.com?

But the user can check the password finder extension from safeimagekit.com which is exclusively made for unlocking image as well as image files in case the user loses his password for his locked image file.

FAQ.question: What will happen to our progress if we refresh our browser while we are using the Pinterest image resizer tool from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The Pinterest image resizer tool from safeimagekit.com is not connected to any server out there, so the data which the user is working on will not be stored anywhere and as a result, it will be erased instantly when the user refreshes the browser which he is working on. The image file which is being converted will also be removed after the user exits or closes the tab on which the extension page of the website is open.
